datasets.name: elf_teams_list
queryLines:
SELECT DISTINCT
  elf_team_id
FROM
  main.dbrx_12daysofdemos.workshop_production
WHERE
  elf_team_id IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  elf_team_id

datasets.name: elf_team_performance_summary
queryLines:
WITH pre_filtered_data AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    (
      materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg
    ) as total_materials,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_plastic_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as plastic_percentage,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_wood_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as wood_percentage
  FROM
    main.dbrx_12daysofdemos.workshop_production
  WHERE
    production_date BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
    AND (
      array_contains(:elf_teams, elf_team_id)
      OR array_contains(:elf_teams, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_categories, toy_category)
      OR array_contains(:toy_categories, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_ids, toy_id)
      OR array_contains(:toy_ids, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:quality_tiers, quality_tier)
      OR array_contains(:quality_tiers, 'ALL')
    )
),
filtered_data as (
  select * from pre_filtered_data where
    plastic_percentage >= :min_plastic_percentage
    AND wood_percentage >= :min_wood_percentage
)
SELECT
  elf_team_id,
  COUNT(DISTINCT batch_id) as total_batches,
  COUNT(DISTINCT toy_id) as unique_toys_produced,
  AVG(paint_quality) as avg_paint_quality,
  AVG(assembly_score) as avg_assembly_score,
  AVG(
    CASE
      WHEN safety_check_passed THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  )
  * 100 as safety_pass_rate,
  AVG(defect_count) as avg_defects,
  SUM(production_time_minutes) / 60 as total_production_hours,
  AVG(production_time_minutes) as avg_production_time,
  AVG(predicted_popularity_score) as avg_popularity_score,
  SUM(carbon_footprint_kg) as total_carbon_footprint,
  SUM(materials_plastic_kg) as total_plastic_kg,
  SUM(materials_wood_kg) as total_wood_kg,
  SUM(materials_metal_kg) as total_metal_kg,
  SUM(materials_fabric_kg) as total_fabric_kg
FROM
  filtered_data
GROUP BY
  elf_team_id
ORDER BY
  avg_assembly_score DESC

datasets.name: daily_production_trend
queryLines:
WITH pre_filtered_data AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    (
      materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg
    ) as total_materials,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_plastic_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as plastic_percentage,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_wood_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as wood_percentage
  FROM
    main.dbrx_12daysofdemos.workshop_production
  WHERE
    production_date BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
    AND (
      array_contains(:elf_teams, elf_team_id)
      OR array_contains(:elf_teams, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_categories, toy_category)
      OR array_contains(:toy_categories, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_ids, toy_id)
      OR array_contains(:toy_ids, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:quality_tiers, quality_tier)
      OR array_contains(:quality_tiers, 'ALL')
    )
),
filtered_data as (
  select * from pre_filtered_data where
    plastic_percentage >= :min_plastic_percentage
    AND wood_percentage >= :min_wood_percentage
)
SELECT
  production_date,
  elf_team_id,
  COUNT(*) as daily_production,
  AVG(assembly_score) as avg_quality_score,
  SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN safety_check_passed THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  ) as safety_passed,
  SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN NOT safety_check_passed THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  ) as safety_failed
FROM
  filtered_data
GROUP BY
  production_date,
  elf_team_id
ORDER BY
  production_date,
  elf_team_id

queryLines:
WITH pre_filtered_data AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    (
      materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg
    ) as total_materials,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_plastic_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as plastic_percentage,
    CASE

        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_wood_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as wood_percentage
  FROM
    main.dbrx_12daysofdemos.workshop_production
  WHERE
    production_date BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
    AND (
      array_contains(:elf_teams, elf_team_id)
      OR array_contains(:elf_teams, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_categories, toy_category)
      OR array_contains(:toy_categories, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_ids, toy_id)
      OR array_contains(:toy_ids, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:quality_tiers, quality_tier)
      OR array_contains(:quality_tiers, 'ALL')
    )
),
filtered_data as (
  select * from pre_filtered_data where
    plastic_percentage >= :min_plastic_percentage
    AND wood_percentage >= :min_wood_percentage
)
SELECT
  elf_team_id,
  quality_tier,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  AVG(assembly_score) as avg_score
FROM
  filtered_data
GROUP BY
  elf_team_id,
  quality_tier

datasets.name: material_usage_by_team
queryLines:
WITH pre_filtered_data AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    (
      materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg
    ) as total_materials,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_plastic_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as plastic_percentage,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_wood_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as wood_percentage
  FROM
    main.dbrx_12daysofdemos.workshop_production
  WHERE
    production_date BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
    AND (
      array_contains(:elf_teams, elf_team_id)
      OR array_contains(:elf_teams, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_categories, toy_category)
      OR array_contains(:toy_categories, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_ids, toy_id)
      OR array_contains(:toy_ids, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:quality_tiers, quality_tier)
      OR array_contains(:quality_tiers, 'ALL')
    )
),
filtered_data as (
  select * from pre_filtered_data where
    plastic_percentage >= :min_plastic_percentage
    AND wood_percentage >= :min_wood_percentage
)
SELECT
  elf_team_id,
  'Plastic' as material_type,
  SUM(materials_plastic_kg) as amount
FROM
  filtered_data
GROUP BY
  elf_team_id
UNION ALL
SELECT
  elf_team_id,
  'Wood' as material_type,
  SUM(materials_wood_kg) as amount
FROM
  filtered_data
GROUP BY
  elf_team_id
UNION ALL
SELECT
  elf_team_id,
  'Metal' as material_type,
  SUM(materials_metal_kg) as amount
FROM
  filtered_data
GROUP BY
  elf_team_id
UNION ALL
SELECT
  elf_team_id,
  'Fabric' as material_type,
  SUM(materials_fabric_kg) as amount
FROM
  filtered_data
GROUP BY
  elf_team_id

datasets.name: efficiency_metrics
queryLines:
WITH pre_filtered_data AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    (
      materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg
    ) as total_materials,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_plastic_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as plastic_percentage,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_wood_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as wood_percentage
  FROM
    main.dbrx_12daysofdemos.workshop_production
  WHERE
    production_date BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
    AND (
      array_contains(:elf_teams, elf_team_id)
      OR array_contains(:elf_teams, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_categories, toy_category)
      OR array_contains(:toy_categories, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_ids, toy_id)
      OR array_contains(:toy_ids, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:quality_tiers, quality_tier)
      OR array_contains(:quality_tiers, 'ALL')
    )
),
filtered_data as (
  select * from pre_filtered_data where
    plastic_percentage >= :min_plastic_percentage
    AND wood_percentage >= :min_wood_percentage
)
SELECT
  elf_team_id,
  toy_category,
  AVG(production_time_minutes) as avg_production_time,
  AVG(defect_count) as avg_defects,
  AVG(carbon_footprint_kg) as avg_carbon_footprint,
  COUNT(*) / COUNT(DISTINCT production_date) as daily_throughput
FROM
  filtered_data
GROUP BY
  elf_team_id,
  toy_category

datasets.name: top_toys_by_team
queryLines:
WITH pre_filtered_data AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    (
      materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg
    ) as total_materials,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_plastic_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as plastic_percentage,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_wood_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as wood_percentage
  FROM
    main.dbrx_12daysofdemos.workshop_production
  WHERE
    production_date BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
    AND (
      array_contains(:elf_teams, elf_team_id)
      OR array_contains(:elf_teams, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_categories, toy_category)
      OR array_contains(:toy_categories, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_ids, toy_id)
      OR array_contains(:toy_ids, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:quality_tiers, quality_tier)
      OR array_contains(:quality_tiers, 'ALL')
    )
),
filtered_data as (
  select * from pre_filtered_data where
    plastic_percentage >= :min_plastic_percentage
    AND wood_percentage >= :min_wood_percentage
),
ranked_toys AS (
  SELECT
    elf_team_id,
    toy_name,
    COUNT(*) as production_count,
    AVG(predicted_popularity_score) as avg_popularity,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY elf_team_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) as rank
  FROM
    filtered_data
  GROUP BY
    elf_team_id,
    toy_name
)
SELECT
  *
FROM
  ranked_toys
WHERE
  rank <= 5

datasets.name: hourly_production_heatmap
queryLines:
WITH pre_filtered_data AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    HOUR(production_timestamp) as hour_of_day,
    DAYOFWEEK(production_date) as day_of_week,
    (
      materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg
    ) as total_materials,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_plastic_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as plastic_percentage,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_wood_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as wood_percentage
  FROM
    main.dbrx_12daysofdemos.workshop_production
  WHERE
    production_date BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
    AND (
      array_contains(:elf_teams, elf_team_id)
      OR array_contains(:elf_teams, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_categories, toy_category)
      OR array_contains(:toy_categories, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_ids, toy_id)
      OR array_contains(:toy_ids, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:quality_tiers, quality_tier)
      OR array_contains(:quality_tiers, 'ALL')
    )
),
filtered_data as (
  select * from pre_filtered_data where
    plastic_percentage >= :min_plastic_percentage
    AND wood_percentage >= :min_wood_percentage
)
SELECT
  elf_team_id,
  hour_of_day,
  day_of_week,
  COUNT(*) as production_count,
  AVG(assembly_score) as avg_quality
FROM
  filtered_data
GROUP BY
  elf_team_id,
  hour_of_day,
  day_of_week

datasets.name: defect_analysis
queryLines:
WITH pre_filtered_data AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    (
      materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg
    ) as total_materials,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_plastic_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as plastic_percentage,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_wood_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as wood_percentage
  FROM
    main.dbrx_12daysofdemos.workshop_production
  WHERE
    production_date BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
    AND (
      array_contains(:elf_teams, elf_team_id)
      OR array_contains(:elf_teams, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_categories, toy_category)
      OR array_contains(:toy_categories, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_ids, toy_id)
      OR array_contains(:toy_ids, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:quality_tiers, quality_tier)
      OR array_contains(:quality_tiers, 'ALL')
    )
),
filtered_data as (
  select * from pre_filtered_data where
    plastic_percentage >= :min_plastic_percentage
    AND wood_percentage >= :min_wood_percentage
)
SELECT
  elf_team_id,
  CASE
    WHEN defect_count = 0 THEN '0 Defects'
    WHEN defect_count BETWEEN 1 AND 2 THEN '1-2 Defects'
    WHEN defect_count BETWEEN 3 AND 5 THEN '3-5 Defects'
    ELSE '6+ Defects'
  END as defect_range,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  AVG(assembly_score) as avg_assembly_score,
  AVG(paint_quality) as avg_paint_quality
FROM
  filtered_data
GROUP BY
  elf_team_id,
  defect_range
ORDER BY
  elf_team_id,
  defect_range

datasets.name: workshop_location_performance
queryLines:
WITH pre_filtered_data AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    (
      materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg
    ) as total_materials,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_plastic_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as plastic_percentage,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_wood_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as wood_percentage
  FROM
    main.dbrx_12daysofdemos.workshop_production
  WHERE
    production_date BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
    AND (
      array_contains(:elf_teams, elf_team_id)
      OR array_contains(:elf_teams, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_categories, toy_category)
      OR array_contains(:toy_categories, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_ids, toy_id)
      OR array_contains(:toy_ids, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:quality_tiers, quality_tier)
      OR array_contains(:quality_tiers, 'ALL')
    )
),
filtered_data as (
  select * from pre_filtered_data where
    plastic_percentage >= :min_plastic_percentage
    AND wood_percentage >= :min_wood_percentage
)
SELECT
  workshop_location,
  elf_team_id,
  COUNT(*) as production_count,
  AVG(assembly_score) as avg_quality,
  SUM(carbon_footprint_kg) as total_carbon
FROM
  filtered_data
GROUP BY
  workshop_location,
  elf_team_id

datasets.name: 10919f22
queryLines:
WITH original_table AS (
    SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC("DAY", `production_date`) AS production_date,
  SUM(`daily_production`) AS daily_production
FROM (
    WITH pre_filtered_data AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    (
      materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg
    ) as total_materials,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_plastic_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as plastic_percentage,
    CASE
      WHEN
        (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg) > 0
      THEN
        (
          materials_wood_kg
          / (materials_plastic_kg + materials_wood_kg + materials_metal_kg + materials_fabric_kg)
        )
        * 100
      ELSE 0
    END as wood_percentage
  FROM
    main.dbrx_12daysofdemos.workshop_production
  WHERE
    production_date BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
    AND (
      array_contains(:elf_teams, elf_team_id)
      OR array_contains(:elf_teams, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_categories, toy_category)
      OR array_contains(:toy_categories, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:toy_ids, toy_id)
      OR array_contains(:toy_ids, 'ALL')
    )
    AND (
      array_contains(:quality_tiers, quality_tier)
      OR array_contains(:quality_tiers, 'ALL')
    )
),
filtered_data as (
  select * from pre_filtered_data where
    plastic_percentage >= :min_plastic_percentage
    AND wood_percentage >= :min_wood_percentage
)
SELECT
  production_date,
  elf_team_id,
  COUNT(*) as daily_production,
  AVG(assembly_score) as avg_quality_score,
  SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN safety_check_passed THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  ) as safety_passed,
  SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN NOT safety_check_passed THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  ) as safety_failed
FROM
  filtered_data
GROUP BY
  production_date,
  elf_team_id
ORDER BY
  production_date,
  elf_team_id
) GROUP BY 1
  ),
  dates AS (
    SELECT 
      MAX(production_date) AS max_date_column,
      MIN(production_date) AS min_date_column,
      MAX_BY(daily_production, production_date) AS daily_production
    FROM original_table
  ),
  forecast_table AS (
    SELECT 
      production_date,
      daily_production_forecast,
      daily_production_upper,
      daily_production_lower,
      NULL AS daily_production
    FROM AI_FORECAST(
      TABLE(original_table),
      horizon => (
        SELECT
          max_date_column + MAKE_DT_INTERVAL(CAST(FLOOR(DATEDIFF(max_date_column, min_date_column) * 0.5) AS INT), 0, 0, 0)
        FROM dates
      ),
      time_col => 'production_date',
      value_col => 'daily_production'
    )
  )

  SELECT * FROM forecast_table
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    production_date,
    NULL AS daily_production_forecast,
    NULL AS daily_production_upper,
    NULL AS daily_production_lower,
    daily_production
  FROM original_table
    WHERE production_date < (SELECT max_date_column FROM dates)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    max_date_column AS production_date,
    daily_production AS daily_production_forecast,
    daily_production AS daily_production_upper,
    daily_production AS daily_production_lower,
    daily_production
  FROM
    dates

lines:
**12 Days of Demos**

#  Elf Team Performance Summary Dashboard 

This dashboard provides a comprehensive performance overview of elf teams across workshop production metrics.
